description: This file defines the KeyboardAdapter class for a RecyclerView used to display a keyboard UI, handling key presses and focus animations within an Android TV app frontend.

classes.name: KeyboardAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for displaying a list of keyboard keys in a RecyclerView, handling user interactions such as clicks, focus changes, and key events.

classes.name: KeyboardAdapter.KeyVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for individual keyboard key views, managing label display and focus styling.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates key item layout and creates a new KeyVH instance.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder, sets focus change, key, and click listeners.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of keys in the adapter.

methods.name: KeyVH.bind
methods.description: Binds a KeyboardKey to the view, setting the label text.

methods.name: KeyVH.applyFocused
methods.description: Applies visual focus styling to the key's overlay based on focus state.
